text:
This pertains to the XML view of a JSP page obtained from TagLibraryValidator

A request time expression should be represented as
'%=request.getParameter("num")%' 

It is represented as 
"%=request.getParameter("e;num"e;)%" 


=============================================================================
A JSp document with such a syntax throws an exception:
A Servlet Exception Has Occurred

org.apache.jasper.compiler.ParseException: /jsp/tlvalidatepos/new.jsp(1,-1)
Reference to undefined entity ""e;".
